biotools.summary: ComBat is a powerful and fast statistical harmonization method developed to mitigate the “batch effect” in gene expression microarray data and was adapted for multi-site dMRI harmonization to reduce scanner/site effect. R library is licensed under Artistic 2.0, while Python and MATLIB is licensed under MIT.
